--- create_table_cluster_set_on_delete.sql
create table foo (
  foo int64
) primary key (foo),
  interleave in parent foobar
             on delete cascade
--- AST
&ast.CreateTable{
  Rparen: 49,
  Name:   &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 13,
        NameEnd: 16,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
    },
  },
  Columns: []*ast.ColumnDef{
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 21,
        NameEnd: 24,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 25,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
      Hidden: -1,
    },
  },
  PrimaryKeys: []*ast.IndexKey{
    &ast.IndexKey{
      DirPos: -1,
      Name:   &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 46,
        NameEnd: 49,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
    },
  },
  Cluster: &ast.Cluster{
    Comma:       50,
    OnDeleteEnd: 112,
    TableName:   &ast.Path{
      Idents: []*ast.Ident{
        &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 75,
          NameEnd: 81,
          Name:    "foobar",
        },
      },
    },
    OnDelete: "ON DELETE CASCADE",
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE TABLE foo (
  foo INT64
) PRIMARY KEY (foo),
INTERLEAVE IN PARENT foobar ON DELETE CASCADE
